segment.source: If your app uses an AdMediatorControl or AdControl to display banner ads, you could increase your ad fill rate and revenue by showing Microsoft affiliate ads in your app.
segment.target: If your app uses an AdMediatorControl or AdControl to display banner ads, you could increase your ad fill rate and revenue by showing Microsoft affiliate ads in your app.

segment.source: About affiliate ads
segment.target: About affiliate ads

segment.source: About affiliate ads
segment.target: About affiliate ads

segment.source: If your app uses an AdMediatorControl or AdControl to display banner ads, you could increase your revenue and ad fill rate by showing Microsoft affiliate ads in your app for products in the Store.
segment.target: If your app uses an AdMediatorControl or AdControl to display banner ads, you could increase your revenue and ad fill rate by showing Microsoft affiliate ads in your app for products in the Store.

segment.source: When users click the affiliate ads and buy products within a given attribution window, you earn revenue on approved purchases.
segment.target: When users click the affiliate ads and buy products within a given attribution window, you earn revenue on approved purchases.

segment.source: Here's how this program works:
segment.target: Here's how this program works:

segment.source: After you opt-in to the Microsoft affiliate ads program in Dev Center, Microsoft picks ads for top products in the Store to serve to your app.
segment.target: After you opt-in to the Microsoft affiliate ads program in Dev Center, Microsoft picks ads for top products in the Store to serve to your app.

segment.source: These products may include apps, games, music, movies, hardware, and software.
segment.target: These products may include apps, games, music, movies, hardware, and software.

segment.source: Note Microsoft only serves affiliate ads into the following ad unit sizes: 300 x 50, 480 x 80, 160 x 600, 300 x 250, or 728 x 90.
segment.target: Note Microsoft only serves affiliate ads into the following ad unit sizes: 300 x 50, 480 x 80, 160 x 600, 300 x 250, or 728 x 90.

segment.source: Microsoft will serve affiliate ads to your app only when no ads from other ad networks are available.
segment.target: Microsoft will serve affiliate ads to your app only when no ads from other ad networks are available.

segment.source: This is intended to help to monetize your unfilled impressions and maximize your ad fill rate.
segment.target: This is intended to help to monetize your unfilled impressions and maximize your ad fill rate.

segment.source: When a user clicks an affiliate ad and buys any product in the Store within a given attribution window, you will be paid a revenue share or a fixed commission for the purchase (up to 10% commission).
segment.target: When a user clicks an affiliate ad and buys any product in the Store within a given attribution window, you will be paid a revenue share or a fixed commission for the purchase (up to 10% commission).

segment.source: To be eligible for a commission, the affiliate ad must result in an eligible sale in either the Store on Windows 10 devices or the web-based Store; sales in the Store on Windows 8.x devices are not eligible for a commission.
segment.target: To be eligible for a commission, the affiliate ad must result in an eligible sale in either the Store on Windows 10 devices or the web-based Store; sales in the Store on Windows 8.x devices are not eligible for a commission.

segment.source: Affiliate ads for digital Store products (including apps, games, music and movies) are only served on Windows 10 devices.
segment.target: Affiliate ads for digital Store products (including apps, games, music and movies) are only served on Windows 10 devices.

segment.source: Affiliate ads for products in the web-based Store (including devices and software) are served on Windows 10 and Windows 8.x devices.
segment.target: Affiliate ads for products in the web-based Store (including devices and software) are served on Windows 10 and Windows 8.x devices.

segment.source: Note You can get paid for any product the user purchases within the attribution window, not just the product that was promoted in your app.
segment.target: Note You can get paid for any product the user purchases within the attribution window, not just the product that was promoted in your app.

segment.source: For free apps that are promoted in your app, you can earn a revenue share for in-app purchases made by the user within the attribution window.
segment.target: For free apps that are promoted in your app, you can earn a revenue share for in-app purchases made by the user within the attribution window.

segment.source: Any earnings you accrue in connection with the Microsoft affiliate ads program will be distributed to you in the payout account you set up in Dev Center, along with your Microsoft advertising earnings.
segment.target: Any earnings you accrue in connection with the Microsoft affiliate ads program will be distributed to you in the payout account you set up in Dev Center, along with your Microsoft advertising earnings.

segment.source: To track the performance of the affiliate ads in your app, refer to the affiliates performance report.
segment.target: To track the performance of the affiliate ads in your app, refer to the affiliates performance report.

segment.source: You can track daily purchases made through affiliate ads in your app and the revenue share that you received.
segment.target: You can track daily purchases made through affiliate ads in your app and the revenue share that you received.

segment.source: Note After a user buys a product in the Store, there is a 45 day waiting period before the purchase can be approved for the affiliate ads program.
segment.target: Note After a user buys a product in the Store, there is a 45 day waiting period before the purchase can be approved for the affiliate ads program.

segment.source: Because of this waiting period, the Estimated revenue, Purchases (approved) and Purchases (pending approval) data on the affiliates performance report for a given day can change after purchases are approved or rejected.
segment.target: Because of this waiting period, the Estimated revenue, Purchases (approved) and Purchases (pending approval) data on the affiliates performance report for a given day can change after purchases are approved or rejected.

segment.source: How to opt in to the affiliate ads program
segment.target: How to opt in to the affiliate ads program

segment.source: To opt in to the Microsoft affiliate ads program:
segment.target: To opt in to the Microsoft affiliate ads program:

segment.source: Go to the MonetizationMonetize with ads page in the Windows Dev Center dashboard.
segment.target: Go to the MonetizationMonetize with ads page in the Windows Dev Center dashboard.

segment.source: In the Microsoft affiliate ads section, check the Show Microsoft affiliate ads in my app box.
segment.target: In the Microsoft affiliate ads section, check the Show Microsoft affiliate ads in my app box.

segment.source: After you check or uncheck this box, you do not need to republish your app for the changes to take effect.
segment.target: After you check or uncheck this box, you do not need to republish your app for the changes to take effect.

segment.source: Related topics
segment.target: Related topics

segment.source: Monetize with ads
segment.target: Monetize with ads

segment.source: Affiliates performance report
segment.target: Affiliates performance report
